name: Gaki
description: The Gaki appears as a grotesque and famished specter, embodying chaos and hunger.
memorable: The Gaki can compel creatures to move closer to it with its Gluttonous Attraction ability, creating a dangerous dynamic in combat.
goals: To consume living beings through manipulation and physical attack.
relations: Other undead creatures, particularly those with hunger or chaotic themes.
environment: Typically found in dark, desolate areas or battlefields where it can hunt for prey.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity and Charisma, making it quick and manipulative.
weaknesses: Very low Strength, limiting its effectiveness in physical confrontations.
attacks: Multiattack with two supernatural bite attacks dealing piercing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Famine, causing necrotic damage to nearby creatures.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception, with a passive score of 14.
additional_information: Immune to cold, necrotic, and poison damage.
Advantage on attack rolls against wounded opponents.
Can move through creatures and objects without limitation.
Causes significant damage with its ranged Spit Acid attack.
test_queries: grotesque undead creature that eats souls
undead monster that causes hunger and fear
monster that attracts creatures to it
